item.title: Flash Writer Implementation for Embedded Systems
item.description: Project Overview Developed a sophisticated Flash Writer application for initializing flash memory in new embedded systems. This critical tool enables the programming of secondary boot loaders (SBL) and establishes the foundation for multi-core boot sequences. item.title: PCIe AHCI Device Driver Development
item.description: Project Overview Led the development of a PCIe AHCI device driver for a Solid State Hybrid Drive (SSHD) system. This innovative storage solution combines HDD capacity with SSD performance by utilizing a PCIe-connected SSD cache for frequently accessed data.
